name: Snowball (itch) (Vecderg)
description:
(HTML ALSO WORKS ON MOBILE)

Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Hurtle down a mountain as a snowball out of control! The bigger you get, the more speed and endurance you gain, but too much and it might work against you!

Controls:

Computer - Space / Enter / Click to Jump

Mobile - Tap to Jump

Programs used:

- Godot (game engine)

- Clip Studio Paint (graphics)

- LMMS (audio)
